column4: ok can someone help me...I am trying to apply the 3355 patch for ut2004..and everytime do the tar -xf ut2004-lnxpatch.tar or whatever..it goes through giving me all these errors..and also does the same if trying to use sudo...
I didn't see a 3369 patch for linux..
on the website there is only 3355 but some other sites have the 3369 for Linu too
Look at gamershell
thanks found it...
just extract the file and run the script
It will ask for your installation directory
what script..its alot of files
Wait I download it again and look what I did :)
you have the release version not the demo right?
yes
You have this one: http://www.gamershell.com/download_11755.shtml?
yes
I am downloading it to my desktop now, you did the same?
okay I think it will be the same, I have UT2004 in my personal folder
You did install UT2004 from Linux right? You are not trying to patch a Windows-UT2004?
sorry download is very slow
just let me know when you figure it out...maybe I am missing something
I did tar -xjf ut2004-lnxpatch3369.tar.bz2
I just right click and do "extract here" :)
I am stupid :p
